td.content: s:patient presents with 6 weeks history of worsening Kidney. pt is a F civil servant aged 29 years. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol pt reports that she smokes once or twice daily o:Height 69 in, Weight 96 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 93, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isotonic Saline (0.9%) - 10 mL/kg per dose, and ordered CT abdomen/pelvis.
